about_the_game:
INSPECTION REPORT is a horror / point & click game focused on exploration and dialogue. Fulfill your duties as a building inspector and explore an abandoned property three years after a catastrophic event ravaged it.



Set in a desolate city, use your flashlight to explore one of your employer's branches. Discover the secrets of the building while avoiding its dangers. Having three separate timelines to go from, connect all the dots in the story and assemble the truth.




  • Use your flashlight: Navigate totally in the dark with only a fraction of your screen visible. Things may or may not attack you out of sight.
  • Uncover items: Use them in clever ways to advance further, or to defend yourself.
  • Discover and explore rooms: Analyze the signs and clues that remain hidden in the building.
  • Solve puzzles: Work through passwords and rituals to progress in the narrative.
  • Stay out of harm's way: Hide or suffer the consequences.
  • Speak with the characters: You are not alone. Are they who they really say the are?

content_descriptors.notes: Flashing lights. Contains blood, bodies and mutilation, although simplified.

name: INSPECTION REPORT DEMO

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4 onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated OpenGL 4 onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: INSPECTION REPORT is a horror / point & click game focused on exploration and dialogue. Fulfill your duties as a building inspector and uncover the secrets of an abandoned property in total dark using only a flashlight.
